answers.answer: Hi!Such an excruciating pain can be due to deep vein thrombosis, pinched spinal nerves in lumbar area, thrombophlebitis (inflammation of veins), cellulitis (infection just under the skin). It is very difficult to comment without examining. Since you have diabetes, chances of infection and clots are high. This can become a medical emergency, so please consult a doctor immediately. Take care!
